code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec good_subsetof_binary_matrix(grid :: [[integer]]) :: [integer]
  def good_subsetof_binary_matrix(grid) do
    0..length(grid) - 1
    |> Enum.filter_map(fn i -> 
      subset = Enum.at(grid, i)
      valid_subset?(grid, [i], subset)
    end, &(&1))
  end

  defp valid_subset?(grid, indices, subset) do
    col_sums = for col <- 0..length(List.first(grid)) - 1, do: Enum.sum(for row <- indices, do: Enum.at(Enum.at(grid, row), col))
    all_valid = Enum.all?(col_sums, fn sum -> sum <= div(length(indices), 2) end)

    if all_valid, do: indices, else: []
  end

  defp select_rows(grid, rows) do
    Enum.map(rows, fn row_index -> Enum.at(grid, row_index) end)
  end
end
